feature.name: Comprehensive release creation flow via Easy Entry

scenarios.name: Complete flow from login to release creation

steps.value: Given the user logs in classically with profile "<Profile>"
When  the user ensures the visibility of the "One release" button by handling the menu if necessary
And   the user clicks on the One release button
And   a pop-up appears with options "Audio", "Video", "Ringtone"
And   the user selects "<ReleaseType>" and clicks "Next"
When  the user verifies the genre or video type pop-up for "<ReleaseType>"
And   the user selects "<GenreOrType>" and navigates to the title creation page
And   the user enters a title "<Title>" for "<ReleaseType>" release and clicks "Create"
Then  the user should see the new title "<Title>" for "<ReleaseType>" release created under "<GenreOrType>"

scenarios.name: Open an existing release and validate information

steps.value: Given the user logs in classically with profile "<Profile>"
And   the user navigates to "Catalog Drafts"
And   the user enters "<ReleaseTitle>" in the search field and clicks the search button
Then  the user should see the release "<ReleaseTitle>" in the list or the user should create it
When  the user clicks on the edit icon next to the title "<ReleaseTitle>"
Then  the user should be redirected to the "Release Information" page
And   the "Release title" field should display the correct title

And I choose the second collaborator from the collaborators list
And I set <secondCollaboratorShare> for the second collaborator

Then I click on the Apply button to create my split successfully

Then I close split creation success modal

feature.name: create a split with percentage for collaborators

scenarios.name: create a split with percentage for collaborators

steps.value: Given I am on the split page
When I click on the button "SET SPLITS"
Then I access to "Split Royalties" page
And I select a "Release" in the first column of the table
And I click on the right button "SET SPLITS"
And I click on the "NEXT" button
And I select collaborator
And I fill in the first colummn with <value_1> of the split rate of the collaborator I selected
And I fill in the second colummn with <value_2> of the split rate of the collaborator I selected
And I click on "CONFIRM" button
Then <value_1> should be visible for 1st collaborator
Then <value_2> should be visible for the 2d collaborator
